qas.question: What type of torture was acquired from Qin law?

context: Various cases for rape, physical abuse and murder were prosecuted in court. Women, although usually having fewer <a4_0>rights<a4_0/> by custom, were allowed to level civil and criminal charges against men. Early Han punishments of torturous <a0_0>mutilation<a0_0/> were borrowed from Qin law.
